name: Card Shark at the Casino (Alpha)
description:
Sneak through a casino and collect some cards.

Controls:

A/D/Left/Right Move left and right

E to hide

W/Up to climb

Credits:

Art: jate8d
https://www.develteam.com/Developer/jatenaver/Portfolio
https://jate8d.itch.io/

Music: SweetboyMusik 
https://soundcloud.com/sweetboymusik/

Programming: NickTheSic 
https://nickthesic.itch.io/

Made for Weekly Game Jam 58, Cards
